**About Us**  
  We're a great host for people who take their websites seriously, want seriously fast servers, and seriously good support. Although we charge reasonable prices, we're not a low-end company, and we don't aim to be one. If you're just looking for rock-bottom prices, then we're probably not a good fit. But if you're looking for unmatched quality, service, and uptime, then look no further than HostAxa.

**Promotion Details**  
  This is a **recurring promotion for 65% off all SSD VPS hosting packages.**
  
**All VPS Hosting Plans Include:**  
  Full Root Access  
  OpenVZ Virtualization      
  24x7 Technical Support    
  99.9% Uptime Guarantee  
  1IP Address  SolusVM Control Panel    
  Choice of any Linux operating system  
  SSD Powered Drives (50x faster than HDD)
